usage: probe seo [-h] [--interactive] [--batch FILE] [--depth N] [--pages N]
                 [--format {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...]]
                 [--output PATH] [--no-cache] [--language {auto,ko,en}]
                 [url]

Comprehensive SEO audit with technical, on-page, and content analysis

positional arguments:
  url                   Target URL to analyze

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --interactive, -i     Launch interactive mode with guided prompts
  --batch FILE, -b FILE
                        Batch process URLs from file
  --depth N, -d N       Crawl depth (default: 2)
  --pages N, -p N       Maximum pages to crawl (default: 50)
  --format {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...], -f {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...]
                        Output format(s) (default: json)
  --output PATH, -o PATH
                        Output directory or file path
  --no-cache            Disable caching and force fresh analysis
  --language {auto,ko,en}, -l {auto,ko,en}
                        Content language for analysis (default: auto)

Examples:
  probe seo https://example.com                    # Basic audit
  probe seo https://site.com -d 3 -p 100          # Deep analysis
  probe seo --interactive                          # Guided mode
  probe seo --batch sites.txt -f pdf html         # Batch processing

usage: probe seo [-h] [--interactive] [--batch FILE] [--depth N] [--pages N]
                 [--format {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...]]
                 [--output PATH] [--no-cache] [--language {auto,ko,en}]
                 [url]

Comprehensive SEO audit with technical, on-page, and content analysis

positional arguments:
  url                   Target URL to analyze

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --interactive, -i     Launch interactive mode with guided prompts
  --batch FILE, -b FILE
                        Batch process URLs from file
  --depth N, -d N       Crawl depth (default: 2)
  --pages N, -p N       Maximum pages to crawl (default: 50)
  --format {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...], -f {json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} [{json,markdown,html,pdf,pptx} ...]
                        Output format(s) (default: json)
  --output PATH, -o PATH
                        Output directory or file path
  --no-cache            Disable caching and force fresh analysis
  --language {auto,ko,en}, -l {auto,ko,en}
                        Content language for analysis (default: auto)

Examples:
  probe seo https://example.com                    # Basic audit
  probe seo https://site.com -d 3 -p 100          # Deep analysis
  probe seo --interactive                          # Guided mode
  probe seo --batch sites.txt -f pdf html         # Batch processing
